title: Trump Trade Review Triggers Retaliation from China (Audio)
itunes:title: Trump Trade Review Triggers Retaliation from China (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Andrew Mayeda, Bloomberg News global trade reporter, discusses the Chinese response after President Trump signed a request to look into how China handles U.S. intellectual property. He speaks with June Grasso and Greg Stohr on Bloomberg Radio's "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
